data.name: DuckDuckGo Nightly Blue - No Background Image
data.description:
Same as https://userstyles.org/styles/171268/duckduckgo-nightly-blue but without the triangle background image.

A dark blue theme for DuckDuckGo. It is recommended you use start.duckduckgo.com instead of duckduckgo.com if you want to access the homepage.

data.name: Homestuck, But Blurple
data.description:
Original Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/157957/homestuck-dark-theme

I took this Dark Theme for https://homestuck.com and put the colours into Discord Blurple colours, because greys like Karkat's Text didn't really... work.
